tei-validation-element-content-unexpecte: $1 is not allowed as child of $2 on line $3.
$1 should not contain text on line $2.
tei-validation-element-content-too-short: A tag like $1 is missing as child of $2 on line $3.
tei-validation-no-root: The TEI XML content has no root tag.
tei-validation-unexpected-root: The TEI XML content root tag should be text or body, found $1.
tei-validation-wrong-namespace: The TEI XML namespace should be http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0, found $1 on line $2.
tei-validation-unknown-tag: $1 is not a supported TEI tag on line $2.
tei-validation-unknown-attribute: $1 is not a supported attribute of tag $2 on line $3.
tei-validation-missing-mandatory-attribu: $1 attribute of tag $2 is missing on line $3.
tei-validation-count-invalid-value: The value of $2 should be a positive integer, $1 found.
tei-validation-enumeration-unknown-value: $1 is not a supported value of the $2. The possible values are: $3.
tei-validation-language-invalid-value: The value of $2 should be a valid language tag, $1 found.
tei-validation-numeric-invalid-value: The value of $2 should be a valid numeric value, $1 found.
tei-validation-output-measurement-invali: The value of $2 should be a valid positive integer, $1 found.
tei-validation-pointer-invalid-value: The value of $2 should be a valid URI, $1 found.
tei-validation-temporal-w3c-invalid-valu: The value of $2 should be a valid ISO 8601 value, $1 found.
tei-validation-truth-value-invalid-value: The value of $2 should be a valid boolean value like true or false, $1 found.
tei-validation-word-invalid-value: The value of $2 should be a valid word, $1 found.
tei-validation-multiple-too-few-values: The value of $2 should contains at least {{PLURAL:$3|one element|$3 elements}}, $1 found that contains {{PLURAL:$4|one element|$4 elements}}.
tei-validation-multiple-too-many-values: The value of $2 should contains at most {{PLURAL:$3|one element|$3 elements}}, $1 found that contains {{PLURAL:$4|one element|$4 elements}}.
tei-parser-file-not-found: The file named $1 does not exist.
apihelp-teiconvert-summary: API module to convert content between TEI and HTML
apihelp-teiconvert-param-title: If <var>$1text</var> is not set, the content of this page. If <var>$1text</var> is set use it as the title of the page during conversion. If it is not set, [[API]] will be used as the title.
apihelp-teiconvert-param-pageid: Convert the content of this page.
apihelp-teiconvert-param-revid: Convert the content of this revision.
apihelp-teiconvert-param-text: Text to parse. Use <var>$1from</var> to control the content format.
apihelp-teiconvert-param-slot: If <var>$1text</var> is not set, which slot to return data for.
apihelp-teiconvert-example-from-title-to: Converts to HTML the content of [[TEI]]
apihelp-teivalidate-summary: API module to validate a TEI document
